dialogues.text:
Please tell me that with these 'charges'
I can also jump twice.

Negative. The jump comes from your physiology,
not the suit. However, the suit is still functionally
advantageous.
But I have nothing to propel myself up there.

Negative.
Analysis concluded: when an ability is performed
correctly, the generated momentum can be used.

If you use propulsion and impact a surface
that halts your trajectory, the momentum
redirects upward.

So you're suggesting I hit the walls so that the
impact pushes me higher?

...
I guess no one will see me make a fool of
myself on this planet.
